title: 服务器tps低有timings和spark
author: nuanxin4419
txt_content:
求大佬指点 服务器有时候tps巨低
https://timings.spigotmc.org/?url=iheruxoyub

https://spark.lucko.me/#FK9XFfFbVn

replies.author: minecraft12581
replies.txt_content:
nuanxin4419 发表于 2020-7-28 15:53
大佬有什么好用的清理实体的插件
直接server.properties文件内把difficulty选项改成1

replies.author: minecraft12581
replies.txt_content:
dp和zy世界实体消耗太高
其次ChestCommands菜单消耗有点大

replies.author: nuanxin4419
replies.txt_content:
xiao_wo 发表于 2020-7-28 15:42
CC菜单占用多似乎
cc菜单我用了模组的贴纸应该影响不大吧 为什么占用会大啊 大佬
